channel.title: Plain neurotheory
channel.description: Theories of neuroscience and other things

item.title: What do the retina and V1 know about spatial frequencies in natural scenes?
item.description: Compared to orientation, the efficient coding objective is more complicated for spatial frequency (SF). This one explores the feasibility of meeting two objectives with one set of SF tuning curves.

item.title: What does V1 know about orientations in natural scenes?
item.description: Introduction and review of the efficient coding principle describing how the brain should allocate its neuronal resources to process natural images. Also some thoughts on how pathological situations could make the optimal solution not so pretty.

item.title: Noise and two simplified forms of Fisher Information
item.description: What is Fisher Information all about? Let's put it to the context of tuning curves and firing rate noise that we are more familiar with.
